job_tasks.phrase: Leiden en innoveren: Neem het voortouw in de technische ontwikkeling van ons Shopify Plus e-commerceplatform over zes domeinen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes taking the lead in the technical development of an e-commerce platform, which is a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Bepaal samen met de oprichters de technologische koers van ons Shopify-platform, implementeer best practices, en blijf continu op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen binnen het Shopify-ecosysteem.
job_tasks.justification: This involves setting the technological direction and implementing best practices, which are traditional software engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Verken en integreer LLM's en AI om je eigen werk of onze interne workflows om bedrijfsprocessen en klantervaringen te verbeteren.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions exploring and integrating LLMs and AI, which falls under the GenAI Specialization category, specifically for improving workflows and customer experiences.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt aan front- en backend, integreert met externe systemen en zet CI/CD, testing en codekwaliteit hoog in het vaandel.
job_tasks.justification: This describes hands-on front-end and back-end development, integration with external systems, and a focus on CI/CD, testing, and code quality, all core software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt en verbetert features die direct waarde toevoegen.
job_tasks.justification: Building and improving features that add value is a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Werk nauw samen met een klein multidisciplinair team om prioriteiten te stellen die aansluiten bij onze ambitieuze doelen.
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with a team to set priorities aligns with software development project management and teamwork.

job_tasks.phrase: Je neemt verantwoordelijkheid, krijgt alle ruimte om beslissingen te nemen, en helpt ons team effectiever te werken.
job_tasks.justification: Taking responsibility and making decisions within a team context relates to software development project execution and team leadership.

job_tasks.phrase: Maak gebruik van CI/CD-pipelines, E2E-testing en zorg voor betrouwbare code door middel van geautomatiseerde tests en code reviews.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase mentions CI/CD pipelines, E2E testing, automated tests, and code reviews, which are all part of operations and ensuring code quality in a software development lifecycle.

soft_skills.phrase: Leiden en innoveren: Neem het voortouw in de technische ontwikkeling van ons Shopify Plus e-commerceplatform over zes domeinen.
soft_skills.justification: The phrase 'Leiden en innoveren' (Lead and innovate) directly maps to the Innovation & Ownership category.

soft_skills.phrase: blijf continu op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen binnen het Shopify-ecosysteem.
soft_skills.justification: Staying up-to-date with the latest developments indicates a commitment to learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Bepaal samen met de oprichters de technologische koers van ons Shopify-platform
soft_skills.justification: Determining the technological course with founders shows an understanding of business strategy and aligning technology with it.

soft_skills.phrase: Hoewel dit niet het hoofdbestanddeel van je rol is, waarderen we enthousiasme en initiatief op dit gebied.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase acknowledges the AI/LLM aspect as secondary but values enthusiasm and initiative, indicating a willingness to engage with these technologies.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken en beslissen: Werk nauw samen met een klein multidisciplinair team om prioriteiten te stellen die aansluiten bij onze ambitieuze doelen.
soft_skills.justification: Working closely with a multidisciplinary team to set priorities aligns with communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Je neemt verantwoordelijkheid, krijgt alle ruimte om beslissingen te nemen
soft_skills.justification: Taking responsibility and having the freedom to make decisions reflects ownership and initiative.

soft_skills.phrase: Of je nu jong of ervaren bent, jouw praktische skills en drive zijn leidend.
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on 'praktische skills' (practical skills) and 'drive' suggests a pragmatic and results-oriented approach to problem-solving.

profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on core software engineering tasks related to an e-commerce platform (Shopify Plus, React, front-end/back-end development, CI/CD, testing). While it mentions exploring and integrating LLMs and AI, it explicitly states this is not the main component of the role. The role involves building and improving features, integrating systems, and maintaining code quality, all of which fall under Macro-Category A. The AI/LLM tasks are secondary and framed as an area to explore rather than a primary responsibility. Therefore, the profile of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, where the role builds software that uses AI/ML features, is the most fitting.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines core software engineering responsibilities and mentions AI/LLM integration as a secondary, exploratory aspect. The technologies listed are predominantly for e-commerce development. The confidence is high, but not a perfect 5, because the AI/LLM part, while secondary, is mentioned, and the exact balance of effort between core SE and AI exploration isn't quantified.
